title: Short Form Video Editor
job_overview:
Are you a creative video editor who understands how to get views on TikTok, Reels, and YouTube Shorts?

At PocketCreative, we’re a premier short form agency in Singapore that have generated over 2 Billion views for our partners and now we’re looking for more motivated and driven editors to join our team. This means consistent projects being handled to you month after month — without spending hours trying to find clients or pitch their services. This role is ideal for editors who love creating fast-paced, engaging short-form videos and know how to get attention online.

If you're interested, fill up this form and we will reach out to you!
Upgrade to see actual info

What You’ll Be Doing
Editing short-form content (15–90 seconds) for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts
Applying viral editing principles (training provided)
Following structured briefs to reduce unnecessary revisions
Improving over time!

What We Provide
Access to creative campaigns from creators and businesses
Clear, structured briefs with timelines and deliverables
A no-cost training library focused on viral video editing and distribution
A supportive editor community — not a gig marketplace
Opportunities to build a strong portfolio

Requirements
Fluent in English: Must be able to communicate effectively in English, both written and spoken.
Knowledge of AI Tools: Basic familiarity with AI-based tools or plugins that can improve workflow efficiency (e.g., for transcription, subtitling, noise removal, etc.).
Editing Tools: Proficient in CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or other editing tools
Familiar with talking head videos: trends, pacing, and hooks that work on TikTok, Reels, and Shorts
Familiarity with Modern Styles & Animations: Should be aware of current trends in talking head video edits, including dynamic text, punch-ins, motion graphics, and engaging transitions.
Reliable, self-motivated, and can work within deadlines
Bonus: You’ve edited for creators or brands before

Compensation
This is a freelance, consistent monthly project role.  Compensation is based on project scope and deliverables, with rates that reward content performance. Payment terms are transparent and direct — no platform cuts or listing fees.

How to Apply
